body: I had created a work-around for this a few months ago. It might meet your requirement as well. This is a skydome for the entire year. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Arj-j*1Gcz3sr3mMGF6DvO4UhJLA2US3qGPyA6Tt7b18zRtrHeK23ct498zeCN8oK91SIhbAuf-RJQS9*Y-TwEhyovNXpjYm/219201671457PM.bmp) The image below shows a skydome created with discrete hours (in this case, 9AM on everyday of the year): [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Arj-j*1Gcz3bvJlQjV4Z6JJcmvleLEXw0melSGmlmIyzoBpm39xPpS4kYSb5HHhZX0BMAz08FrFcrqqFdoKefW9wpWkgdLt5/219201671118PM.bmp) The ghfile and the csv file for the calculations are attached. (Just remember that this was a hack and I can't guarantee that it will work properly on your system ! I am not sure if Honeybee has a native way of addressing this issue. I think Mostapha, Chris or Abraham might have a better solution. )
